laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial UFC levels were 1507 nmol/24 h, reduced to 302 nmol/24 h after surgery, then later increased again to 1296 nmol/24 h.
ACTH level increased to 603.5 pg/ml 6 months after initial surgery.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 18.0 µg/dl (496.6 nmol/liter; normal, 2 µg/dl or 54 nmol/liter)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Post-surgery: decreased to 9.4 µg/dl (253 nmol/liter); later after recurrence: remained elevated at 18.6 µg/dl (513 nmol/liter), then decreased to 0.2 µg/dl (5.4 nmol/liter) after second surgery.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 16.5 µg/dl (456.2 nmol/liter) after 1 mg; 18.5 µg/dl (511 nmol/liter) after 2 mg; 4.4 µg/dl (118 nmol/liter) after 8 mg (suppressed over 50%)

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: ACTH gradient greater than 3 pre-surgery, maintaining elevated ratios post-surgery.
